different sample sizes in 2 groups. Table 1 lists the included
studies and their main characteristics. These studies covered
Europe, Asia, America, and Africa. The average NOS score was
5.08, which revealed that the methodological quality was of
average level (Table 1 and Supplemental Table 4, http://links.
